Author: eren0x
Title: New ICO - BitMinutes - Better Than BitCoin for Billions
Body: BitMinutes is the first prepaid airtime token to provide low-cost financial services to the world's two billion unbanked consumers. BitMinutes serve as the universal cryptocurrency for enabling global telecommunications providers, retail merchants and a network of trusted agents to offer free money transfer and guaranteed loans to billions of cellphone users.

Author: eren0x
Title: New ICO - BitMinutes - Better Than BitCoin for Billions
Body: BitMinutes represent a business opportunity to entrepreneurial individuals, retail merchants and telecommunications carriers to offer financial services cost-effectively. By reducing money transfer costs, adding liquidity to a major global asset class of prepaid minutes and establishing credit history for the global unbanked, BitMinutes will raise the standard of living in many countries, greatly expanding the middle class to the benefit of all. Hence, the primary goal of The Bitminutes ICO is to provide access to these key financial services for over two billion unbanked worldwide.

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: New ICO - BitMinutes - Better Than BitCoin for Billions
Body: This Monday Sees Another $0.002 Price Rise for The BitMinutes Pre-ICO  BitMinutes, a fintech start-up, has a dream of revolutionizing Third-World financial services through the aggressive use of FinTech innovations and the vehicle of a cryptocurrency called BitMinutes.  Their stated mission is to improve on the BitCoin idea (hence the tagline ‚Äúbetter than BitCoin for billions‚Äù) to create a cryptocurrency that ties itself to one of the world‚Äôs most widely traded informal currencies: The Prepaid Airtime Minute. The developed world doesn‚Äôt pay for phone time by the minute anymore, but the developing world does, and will for some time. The unlimited dataplan is not financially feasible for Mobile operators in those parts of the world. The prepaid minute has become a token of exchange on the same mobile network, trading minutes back and forth to top each other up, pay debts and the like. BitMinutes plans to provide a way to make those minutes tradable between networks and cashable - unlocking serious economic opportunity, by making financial transactions much less expensive.  Read the details in the article of Coinidol dot com, the world blockchain news outlet: https://coinidol.com/another-price-rise-for-bitminutes-pre-ico/

Author: maxbitminutes
Title: New ICO - BitMinutes - Better Than BitCoin for Billions
Body: Thanks for asking. That is the plan as we see it. Disintermediate the old delivery systems with their rent-seeking middlemen, and use our built universal value exchange to deliver a full suite of less expensive, more transparent, more reliable financial services to communities whose lack of access is hindering their own economic growth. Simply look to the economic explosion that occurred in China when the stifling old communist system was thrown off, and working for personal gain became possible. We see hundreds of other communities that will explode once the proper economic tools are delivered to them. As you cite, that is not just free money transfer, but depository services, insurance, micro-credit, and a universal tracking mechanism that allows for credit scoring based on a behavior profile that is appropriate for that region, not the First World. To do that sustainably, the delivery of those financial services has to be profitable, not subsidized by NGO grants or government aid. That sort of help is inefficiently and inconsistently delivered, and is not the long term answer to true financial inclusion.

Their stated mission is to improve on the BitCoin idea (hence the tagline ‚Äúbetter than BitCoin for billions‚Äù) to create a cryptocurrency that ties itself to one of the world‚Äôs most widely traded informal currencies: The Prepaid Airtime Minute. The developed world doesn‚Äôt pay for phone time by the minute anymore, but the developing world does, and will for some time. The unlimited dataplan is not financially feasible for Mobile operators in those parts of the world. The prepaid minute has become a token of exchange on the same mobile network, trading minutes back and forth to top each other up, pay debts and the like. BitMinutes plans to provide a way to make those minutes tradable between networks and cashable. That could unlock serious economic opportunity, by making financial transactions much less expensive. But they have to build this business up, and have chosen the ICO route to fund their next rollout phase. They will be running the ICO in May....

Author: maxbitminutes
Title: New ICO - BitMinutes - Better Than BitCoin for Billions
Body: Response:In the mobile phone industry, prepaid refers to a type of mobile phone account that requires its owner to purchase call credit before services can be used and can be purchased from any mobile carrier.  BitMInutes can be purchased at Bitminutes.com and used as Prepaid mobile minutes or used to transfer money.
